name: Cytopolis Prototype
description:
Create and manage a your own biology cell. Purchase organelles using ATP, equip them to your cell, use them to create different enzymes and generate resources that allows you to grow up!

  • Mitochondria: the powerhouse of the cell, generates ATP!
  • Membrane Receptor: generate Oxygen, Hydrogen, Nitrogen and Carbon.
  • Nucleus: Using O, H, N & C you will generate amino acids.
  • Ribosome: fold amino acids to generate glucose, this will allow to generate more powerful enzymes to generate even more resources.
  • Endoplasmic Reticulum: create a Cripr enzyme to generate bacteriophages, these are used to attack other players and steal their resources.
  • Plastid: equip these organelles to improve defense against other players.
